Title: Extends the provisions of accepting payment in lieu of taxes for property acquired for parks or recreational purposes
Summary: Extends the provisions of accepting payment in lieu of taxes for property acquired for parks or recreational purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend to amend chapter 846 of the laws of 1970, amending the county law relating to payment in lieu of taxes for property acquired for park or recreational purposes, in relation to extending the term of effectiveness of such chapter
